name: Magic Puzzles - Pet Jigsaw Puzzle Games for Free
name_original: Magic Puzzles - Pet Jigsaw Puzzle Games for Free
description:
*** This is Jigsaw game you've been looking for! ***
Sit back and relax with a jigsaw puzzle with many cute puppy.
Jigsaw puzzle is great for puzzlers of all ages!
Simply adjust the difficulty of the puzzle for the player.

** Features **

- Play from our cute puppy collection, high quality images!
- Beautifully easy, Natural interface that is simple and easy to use
- Turn your personal photos into your own custom puzzles!
- Fun rebuses for both adults and kids
- You can play on your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad!
- Optionally rotate pieces for a greater challenge
- Randomized pieces -- no two puzzles are the same
- Saves every puzzle you've ever solved

We spent hundreds of hours perfecting every part of this game in order to bring you the best enjoy time ever!!!

Download it right now to relax with fun puzzles for FREE! Limited Time!!

We wish you a lot of fun with our games!
To get the latest news, updates and promotions please just like our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/FunFactoryStudioZ
